wikipedia_page.main: Usha Kumari Prashar, Baroness Prashar,  (born 29 June 1948) is a British politician and a crossbench member of the House of Lords. Since the 1970s, she has served as a director or chair of a variety of public and private sector organisations. She became the first chair of the Judicial Appointments Commission upon its creation in April 2006.

response: *  1948   – Usha Prashar, Baroness Prashar, Kenyan-English politician
